attributes.name: Person
attributes.description: The people in your organization with access to Calendar.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the person

attributes.name: created_at
attributes.description: UTC time at which the person was created

attributes.name: first_name
attributes.description: The person's first name

attributes.name: last_name
attributes.description: The person's last name

attributes.name: middle_name
attributes.description: The person's middle name

attributes.name: updated_at
attributes.description: UTC time at which the person was updated

attributes.name: avatar_url
attributes.description: Path to where the avatar image is stored

attributes.name: child
attributes.description: Indicates whether the person is a child

attributes.name: contact_data
attributes.description:
An object containing the person's contact data.

This can include an array of `email_addresses`, `addresses` and `phone_numbers`

attributes.name: gender
attributes.description: `M` indicates male, `F` indicates female

attributes.name: has_access
attributes.description: Indicates whether the person has access to Calendar

attributes.name: name_prefix
attributes.description:
Possible values:
- `Mr.`
- `Mrs.`
- `Ms.`
- `Miss`
- `Dr.`
- `Rev.`

attributes.name: name_suffix
attributes.description:
Possible values:
- `Jr.`
- `Sr.`
- `Ph.D.`
- `II`
- `III`

attributes.name: pending_request_count
attributes.description:
If the person is a member of an approval group, the number of EventResourceRequests needing resolution.

If `resolves_conflicts` is `true`, the count will also include the number of Conflicts needing resolution.

attributes.name: permissions
attributes.description: Integer that corresponds to the person's permissions in Calendar

attributes.name: resolves_conflicts
attributes.description: Indicates whether the person is able to resolve Conflicts

attributes.name: site_administrator
attributes.description: Indicates whether the person is a Organization Administrator

attributes.name: status
attributes.description:
Possible values:
- `active`: The person is marked "active" in People
- `inactive`: The person is marked "inactive" in People


Possible values: `active`, `pending`, or `inactive`

attributes.name: event_permissions_type
attributes.description: Event permissions for the person

attributes.name: people_permissions_type
attributes.description: People permissions for the person

attributes.name: room_permissions_type
attributes.description: Room permissions for the person

attributes.name: resources_permissions_type
attributes.description: Resource permissions for the person

attributes.name: organization
attributes.description: include associated organization

attributes.name: created_at
attributes.description: prefix with a hyphen (-created_at) to reverse the order

attributes.name: first_name
attributes.description: prefix with a hyphen (-first_name) to reverse the order

attributes.name: last_name
attributes.description: prefix with a hyphen (-last_name) to reverse the order

attributes.name: resolves_conflicts
attributes.description: prefix with a hyphen (-resolves_conflicts) to reverse the order

attributes.name: updated_at
attributes.description: prefix with a hyphen (-updated_at) to reverse the order

attributes.name: created_at
attributes.description: query on a specific created_at

attributes.name: first_name
attributes.description: query on a specific first_name

attributes.name: last_name
attributes.description: query on a specific last_name

attributes.name: middle_name
attributes.description: query on a specific middle_name

attributes.name: updated_at
attributes.description: query on a specific updated_at

attributes.name: per_page
attributes.description: how many records to return per page (min=1, max=100, default=25)

attributes.name: offset
attributes.description: get results from given offset
